That's just one example of the real time continuous

1386.text:

1397.text:

1406.text:

1418.text:
today. When Galileo developed a telescope

1427.text:

the scientific community of the day. What

1448.text:

1456.text:

1461.text:

1467.text:

1473.text:
some potential solutions to bear down on the

1478.text:
that process of continuous improvement.
When it was put to the doctors more than 50%

1485.text:

1493.text:
problem.
Only when science moved over here and it said,

1500.text:
“You know what? We are bright people, we've

1508.text:
could be better.” Now that you know they

1525.text:

1535.text:

1539.text:
alone, that led to the revolutions that followed.

1554.text:

1561.text:
also quite good by the way.
